dragDrop: Drag and drop your favorite apps in any order to customize your app launcher
dragSecondary: Drag apps here that you don't use very often.

descriptions.360 VR: View 360 VR Experiences on desktops, mobile devices, and VR headsets.
descriptions.ArcGIS Dashboards: Display maps and data in an interactive dashboard.
descriptions.ArcGIS Earth: Visualize and explore geospatial content on a 3D globe.
descriptions.ArcGIS Excalibur: Annotate, mark up, and add observations or measurements to imagery.
descriptions.ArcGIS Experience Builder: Build immersive web apps your way.
descriptions.ArcGIS Explorer: View and interact with GIS content in this free app.
descriptions.ArcGIS for Power BI: Enhance Power BI reports with spatial analysis and visualization.
descriptions.ArcGIS Field Maps: Streamline mobile workflows for field personnel.
descriptions.ArcGIS Field Maps Early Access: Create maps and smart forms for use in the field.
descriptions.ArcGIS GeoBIM: Add geospatial context to Autodesk projects.
descriptions.ArcGIS Hub: Transform how you share data, collaborate, and engage with your community.
descriptions.ArcGIS Indoors: Create and manage floor plan data to compose floor-aware maps.
descriptions.ArcGIS Indoors Floor Plan Editor: Modify floor plan data of indoor spaces.
descriptions.ArcGIS Indoors Space Planner: Visualize and plan occupant assignments in indoor spaces.
descriptions.ArcGIS Maps for Adobe Creative Cloud: Design with data-driven maps in Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop.
descriptions.ArcGIS Mission Responder: Empower users in the field to participate in active missions.
descriptions.ArcGIS Online: Build and share interactive web maps and apps.
descriptions.ArcGIS Solutions: Leverage industry-specific mapping configurations of ArcGIS.
descriptions.ArcGIS Urban: Evaluate urban impacts with 3D visualizations and urban analytics.
descriptions.ArcGIS Velocity: Ingest data from the Internet of Things (IoT).
descriptions.Business Analyst: Leverage location-based market and community intelligence.
descriptions.Data Pipelines: Prepare and integrate data for visualization and analysis.
descriptions.Developer Documentation: Access resources and information for developer workflows.
descriptions.Esri Redistricting: Complete and share regulation-compliant redistricting plans.
descriptions.GeoPlanner for ArcGIS: Leverage data-informed planning that engages your audience.
descriptions.Insights for ArcGIS: Fuse location analytics with business intelligence workflows.
descriptions.Instant Apps: Quickly transform maps into template-based applications.
descriptions.Living Atlas: Add trusted, curated content into your maps
descriptions.Map Viewer: Create and share interactive maps and data-driven visualizations.
descriptions.Marketplace: Browse products and services to extend the capabilities of ArcGIS.
descriptions.Scene Viewer: Visualize geospatial data through interactive 3D scenes on the web.
descriptions.Story Maps: Build and share stories with maps.
descriptions.Survey123: Gather data with an intuitive form-centric solution.
descriptions.Track Viewer: Create track views that define who is tracked and who can view those tracks.
descriptions.Vector Tile Style Editor: Create and maintain your own customized versions of Esri's vector
descriptions.Wayback Imagery: Explore a digital archive of basemap imagery.
descriptions.Web Editor: Streamline data maintenance workflows with a wide array of editing tools.
descriptions.Workforce: Streamline the planning and coordination of your mobile workforce.
descriptions.XR Viewer (early access): Explore GIS data with a VR headset.
